hero.title: Hi, I'm Deepak Negi!
hero.des0: I am a graduate in Bachelor Of Technology majoring in Electronics and Communication Engineering.
hero.des1: I enjoy building high-quality products with a complex logic behind it.
hero.des2: My technology stack includes React, Node/Express, MongoDb and Hasura.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning more about Svelte and React Native.
